U_SAPCode > #bathLastSAPCode#

SELECT BIN_OrganizationID AS organizationId, NodeID.GetAncestor(1).ToString() AS couHigherPath FROM Basis.BIN_Organization WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND DepartCode = #counterCode#
SELECT CONVERT(hierarchyid,#agencyNodeId#).GetDescendant(max(NodeID), NULL).ToString() AS newNodeId FROM Basis.BIN_Organization WHERE NodeID.GetAncestor(1)=#agencyNodeId#

SELECT Z.BrandCode AS BrandCode, X.CounterCode AS CounterCode, X.CounterNameIF AS CounterName, X.CounterKind AS counterKind, X.[PassWord] AS PassWord, X.CounterSynergyFlag AS CounterSynergyFlag, X.ValidFlag AS ValidFlag, R.RegionCode AS RegionCode, CC.RegionCode AS Citycode, N.ResellerCode AS AgentCode, N.ResellerName AS AgentName, O.ExpiringDate,
L.ChannelNameForeign AS Channel, R.RegionNameForeign AS RegionName, CC.RegionNameForeign AS CityName
L.ChannelName AS Channel, R.RegionNameChinese AS RegionName, CC.RegionNameChinese AS CityName
L.ChannelName AS Channel, R.RegionNameChinese AS RegionName, CC.RegionNameChinese AS CityName
FROM Basis.BIN_CounterInfo X JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization O ON (O.BIN_OrganizationID = X.BIN_OrganizationID) LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region R ON (O.BIN_RegionID = R.BIN_RegionID AND R.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region CC ON (O.BIN_CityID = CC.BIN_RegionID AND CC.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_BrandInfo Z ON (X.BIN_BrandInfoID = Z.BIN_BrandInfoID AND Z.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Channel L ON (X.BIN_ChannelID = L.BIN_ChannelID AND L.ValidFlag = '1') LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_ResellerInfo N ON (X.BIN_ResellerInfoID = N.BIN_ResellerInfoID AND N.ValidFlag = '1') WHERE X.CounterCode = #counterCode#

SELECT A.BIN_RegionID AS regionId, A.RegionType AS regionType FROM Basis.BIN_Region A LEFT JOIN Basis.BIN_Region B ON(A.NodeID=(B.NodeID).GetAncestor(0) OR A.NodeID=(B.NodeID).GetAncestor(1) OR A.NodeID=(B.NodeID).GetAncestor(2)) WHERE B.RegionNameChinese=#cityName#
